article.title: Status and history for ccx
article.para: No known problems at this time.

history.history-entry: ISO 639-3 ccx has been retired, as it was a generic name. Switching to the most spoken language in the group, zyb, “Zhuang, Yongbei”.
[Eric Muller] merged paragraphs 2 and 3 of the preamble which are obviously the second recital. Resolved the HYPHEN.
stage 4: OHCHR identified as the source, complete XML contributed by Adobe Systems.
